title: Really? Riot Please. S10 preview?

embed.description: Easily capture screenshots, GIFs, and replays that are ready to share. Download the free app for windows and mac.

body:
What a Reason to int. 

Oh yeah, apparently its jg and adc fault we lost. come on Riot please do something. it's a frick comedy festival in here

replies.body: I don't think they're intentionally feeding. Yes, their score is bad but have you considered they might just be having a bad game or even a bad day? They could be on tilt. Instead of saying "report mid lane pls" maybe you could have tried to encourage them to win? If you're more positive in game there's always a higher chance of winning. Since there is no context I just drew my own conclusion. Just my two cents.
he said at level 1 when he died that he is going to int, he proceeded to walk to lane and afk at tower sometimes hit minions

and for the record in my games this morning, I have been told I am going to have my knee caps kicked in, I have been told that I'm a %%%got and should consider suicide. I had a heim support who intentionally took ever cannon minion fed lane and proceed to threaten people. OCE server is hilarious today
it's the weekend, might be kids
todays definitely bad so its possible, how ever this game has been pretty bad the last week

You should have ganked his lane.

JG diff.
